articles.author: Sandeep Dwivedi
articles.title: PCB chief on India-Pakistan World Cup game in Ahmedabad: ‘One way of saying, don’t come to India’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Najam Sethi says hybrid model for Asia Cup means Pakistan will play their World Cup games in Dhaka and India doesn't need to travel to Pakistan for Champions Trophy.
articles.content: Pakistan Cricket Board chairman Najam Sethi said on Thursday that India’s refusal to travel to Pakistan for the Asia Cup would impact the forthcoming ICC events in the region. Agreeing to move India’… [+3916 chars]
